summary: The Oakland Athletics, or "A's," are a professional baseball team from Oakland, California. They play in the American League West division of Major League Baseball (MLB). The team has won nine World Series championships, the second-most in the American League. Founded in Philadelphia in 1901, they moved to Kansas City in 1955 and then to Oakland in 1968. Known for their success in the 1970s and late 1980s, the A's are planning to move to Las Vegas after the 2024 season, becoming the first MLB team to relocate since 2005.
title: Oakland Athletics
